food.description: Hate having bread ends? Turn the outward sides inwards to make a sandwich, perfect for little kids, they'll never know!
Putting Vodka on your face reduces the chances of acne breakouts by tightening your pores.
Shake a can of mixed nuts before you eat them. The larger ones will always rise to the top.
Put a slice of bread in a container of stale or hardened cookies to make them soft again.
When making a cake, always add 2 tbs. boiling water to the butter and sugar mixture. This makes a fine textured cake.
Put sprinkles on the bottom of the cone so ice cream doesn't leak out.
Reheat leftover pizza on a frying pan. It'll keep the crust from getting soft.
Turn your spoon upside down when pouring milk into a bowl of cereal to prevent splashing.
Eating watermelon can help reduce acne breakouts and keep skin Health & Fitnessier.
Use lollipops to stir mixed drinks to give them extra flavor.
Have leftover coffee from this morning? Make coffee ice cubes. Can be used to cool iced coffee without diluting it.
People who regularly eat fast food are 51% more likely to become depressed.
Overcooked your bacon while making breakfast? Crumble it and add it into your scrambled eggs!
To stop a popsicle from dipping on your hands, stick a muffin tin through the stick so it catches the mess.
Making cookies and don't have any eggs? Sure you could ask the neighbor, but half a banana (per egg) works as a good substitute!
Pour pancake batter over strips of bacon to make the best pancakes ever!
Put a small amount of water in a glass when you microwave your pizza to keep the crust from getting chewy.
Caramel Apple Slices: Hollow out half an apple, pour caramel in, let harden in the freezer, cut into slices, enjoy!
Popcorn pops better when stored in cold places like the refrigerator.
Slurping your food loudly at Japanese restaurants is actually seen as a positive gesture and indicates to the chef that you enjoy the food.
Starbucks offers a size smaller than Tall: Short! Cheaper, and a much Health & Fitnessier size. Just ask the barista.
Honey, when mixed with vinegar and water, can remove worms and other parasites in your body.
Honey is the only food that will never rot. A jar of honey can remain edible for over 3,000 years.
Eating mangoes before smoking marijuana can heighten it's effects!
Extra Bacon and Extra Cheese is free of charge with the order of a Bacon Cheeseburger at Five Guys.
The easiest homemade Pizza dough: 1 cup of greek yogurt and 1 cup of self rising flour... Thats it!
Crush up Oreo cookies and put them in a salt grinder for an easy and tasty dessert toppings.
Poke a fork through the creamy part of an Oreo so you can dip the whole Oreo in milk without getting your fingers wet.
When you add cream, coffee stays warm 20% longer.
Stuffy nose? Leave a sliced onion near where you sleep and let it sit for the night. When you wake up you'll have a clear nose.
Nutella Cookies: 1 cup Nutella, 1 whole egg, 1 cup flour. Bake for 6-8 min at 350.
Drinking chocolate milk has been proven to help relieve muscle soreness after a workout.
Turn bread upside down when cutting it, this will save it from being squished and is also easier to cut.
Mixing alcohol with diet coke will get you more drunk than mixing it with regular coke.
Twist open an oreo and put in melted chocolate and a roasted marshmallow. I call it them S'moreos.
If you have just eaten a hot pepper or another spicy food, eat some yogurt. The relief comes immediately and it works better than bread or milk.
Put chocolate and strawberries in an ice tray for a delicious treat.
Cauliflower dipped in barbecue sauce tastes almost the same as chicken nuggets and it's infinitely Health & Fitnessier.
Peanut shells are edible, you don't actually have to take them off to eat the peanut.
Banana is a happy fruit. Eating just one can help relieve irritable emotions, anger and or depression.
At a restaurant, you'll never go wrong ordering the chef's favorite dish.
Take a sip of coffee before adding sugar, you won't need as much sugar for it to taste as sweet afterwards.
Push a straw through the middle of a strawberry to easily remove the stem.
To easily eat an orange, cut a slit in the top and the bottom and simply roll it out.
Mix vodka + candy in a container. Wait a day, then get drunk while snacking!
Gatorade or Powerade is only Health & Fitnessy when it's during a workout, and watered down. Otherwise it's all just extra sugar and empty calories.
Replace the butter in almost every recipe with coconut oil. It has a rich, lightly sweet taste, and it is super Health & Fitnessy.
Put Pancake Mix in a Ketchup bottle for a clean no-mess experience.
Buying ice cream? Press on the top of the container, if it's solid it has been properly stored, if it depresses it has thawed and refrozen.
To get rid of fruit flies, fill a bowl with apple cider vinegar and a bit of soap. The vinegar attracts them, the soap will kill them.
Add one teaspoon of lemon juice to each quart of water when cooking rice, this will keep rice fluffy.
The more you flip meat when cooking, the more it looses its crispness and natural juices.
Hate that dust in the last couple bowls of cereal? Pour it into a strainer first!
When making tacos, put the cheese on before the meat. The cheese will melt and prevent the taco shell from breaking apart!
To cook bacon perfectly, put it on tin foil, heat the oven to 400 degrees, and bake it for 12 minutes.
Microwave a Nature Valley bar for 30 seconds to prevent crumbs when you eat it.
Eating Salmon can help your hair grow faster.
Mountain Dew was originally made to be mixed with whiskey. Try it!
When storing empty airtight containers, throw in a pinch of salt to keep them from getting stinky.
Eating bananas at the time of conception increases the chances of having a baby boy.
Use a bread tab to hold your spot on a roll of tape.
Hungry and want a ride home? Go to the local pizza shop, order a pizza for delivery, and get a ride home with the driver.
Nutella + milk in the microwave will give you the best hot chocolate ever!
If no jelly is available for a PB & J, use maple syrup instead. Just as delicious.
Mix 1/4 cup of vinegar, honey and take 1 tablespoon 6 times a day to kill all the bacteria in your sore throat.
Lemon water helps clean the toxins out of our bodies. When you get rid of toxic waste in your system, your skin will show it first.
Taco hack: Wrap a soft tortilla around the crunchy one it'll hold everything way better, + you can put beans/cheese between them!
Stuff marshmallows BEFORE you roast them! Chocolate chips, peanut butter cups, strawberries... endless possibilities!
Microwaving lemons and other fruits for fifteen seconds can double the amount of juice you get from them.
Soak Oreos in half-and-half, and lay them on wax paper in the freezer. In an hour, each one will be a delicious mini ice cream sandwich.
Did your tortilla chips get a little stale? Toss them in the oven for 10 minutes at 375 degrees. They will come out just like new!
Put crushed up Oreos or Doritos in an old pepper shaker to spice up your bland meals.
You can add two eggs and half a cup of oil to turn any cake mix into cookie dough.
Recipe for relaxation: exhale completely, inhale for four seconds, hold your breath for seven seconds and exhale for eight seconds.
Mix two cups of cool whip, six tablespoons of Nutella, and one cup of milk. Put it in molds in the freezer to make Nutella pops!
Keep bananas fresher longer by wrapping the stems in plastic wrap.
When reheating rice or pasta in the microwave, sprinkle a little bit of water on top first. This will make it taste way better, almost like you just made it.
Don't have any butter for your grilled cheese? Whisk an egg until fully mixed, then spread with a fork onto your bread. It really works!
If you peel a banana from the bottom, you won't have to pick the little 'stringy things' off of it.
Make 'cookie bowls' by simply turning your muffin or cupcake pan upside down.
Nutella Mug Cake: 4 Tbsp flour, 1/4 tsp baking powder, 1/4 cup Nutella, 3 Tbsp milk and then microwave for 1 minute.
Coffee has been found to reverse liver damage caused by alcohol.
Eating breakfast in the morning makes it ten times easier to burn calories throughout the day. It also makes you less likely to get acne.
You can actually soften cookies by placing a slice of bread inside the jar.
Oysters, lean meat, seafood, and whole grains are all foods that have been proven to boost sex drive.
Use condiment bottles filled with icing for an easy way to decorate cookies and cakes.
Ketchup can be used to clean copper pots and pans. The acid in the ketchup removes tarnish and brings out the shine.
Trouble with chopsticks? It is perfectly acceptable to eat sushi with your hands since that was the way it was originally done in Japan.
Unload a fridge pack of Coke in a jiffy by opening both ends and pulling out the box.
The most effective cough syrup that exists is honey.
Run your bacon under cold water before cooking it. Doing so will reduce shrinkage by up to 50%.
Trying to cut sugar out of your diet? Freeze bananas. They are much sweeter that way and you will have a great tasty treat.
Tired of jelly soaking through your peanut butter and jelly sandwiches? Spread the peanut butter on both sides of the bread and put the jelly in the middle.
Buy bananas in various degrees of ripeness, so that you will have a ripe one to eat every day.
Butter too hard or frozen to spread? Grab a cheese grater and grate it right onto the bread. Works like a charm!
To chill a warm beer in 2 minutes, wrap a wet paper towel around the bottle, and place it upright in the freezer.
Pistachio too hard to open? Stick a used shell in the crack and turn it like a key. It'll pop right open!
The funniest way to peel eggs: create a small hole at the top of a boiled egg and a large one at the bottom. Blow into the small hole and watch the egg pop out!
Pop a lime in the microwave 30 seconds for the juiciest lime ever.
To keep potatoes from budding, place an apple in the bag with the potatoes.
Need to peel garlic cloves? Place them in an empty pot. Put the lid on and shake vigorously. Done
When adding ingredients to cocktails, always start with the cheapest. For example, add your citrus, then fruit juice, then alcohol.
